parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From ek and homologeo; to acknowledge or agree fully.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To seek, search for, desire, require, demand. Of uncertain affinity; to seek; specially, to worship, or to plot.
A convenient time, opportunity. From eukairos; a favorable occasion.
From para and didomi; to surrender, i.e yield up, intrust, transmit.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Apart from, without. A particle probably akin to aneu; aloof, i.e. Apart from.
From a derivative of echo; a throng; by implication, the rabble; by extension, a class of people; figuratively, a riot.
